title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 8.6 - Presiding officer to convene local board and take action directed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 8.6 - Presiding officer to convene local board and take action directed

State Regulations

Upon the receipt of such notice from the State Commissioner of Health, the presiding officer of the local board of health shall promptly convene such local board, which shall take the action directed by the said commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
8.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
